and (

address1 like #{address1}||'%' or
)

select type from attendee where attendee_id = (select max(attendee_id) from attendee where gathering_id = #{gathering_id} and user_id = #{user_id})

and (Lower(title) like lower('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or Lower(gathering_content) like lower('%'||#{keyword}||'%'))
order by gathering_id desc )a ) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
select g.*, m.nickname as nickname from gathering g join member m on g.writer_id = m.userid where g.gathering_id = #{gathering_id} and show = 'y'

nvl((select max(reply_id) from gathering_reply)+1,1)
#{parent_reply}
, #{inner_order}, #{depth}, #{reply_text}, #{creator_id})

select maxPeople, (select count(*) from attendee where gathering_id = #{gathering_id} and type = 'a' ) as attendeeCount, attendSystem, show, gathering_date from gathering where gathering_id = #{gathering_id}
mapper.update: update attendee set type = 'l' where attendee_id = (select max(attendee_id) from attendee where gathering_id = #{gathering_id} and user_id = #{user_id})

mapper.select: select user_id, nickname from ( select user_id from attendee where gathering_id = #{gathering_id} group by user_id ) a join member m on m.userid = a.user_id
select count(*) from attendee a join gathering g on a.gathering_id = g.gathering_id where a.user_id = #{user_id} and (type = 'a' or type = 'w') and g.gathering_date > sysdate
mapper.update: update gathering set finishChat = 'y' where gathering_date + 3 <= sysdate and finishchat = 'n'

from gathering g join member m on g.writer_id = m.userid where show = 'y' and userid = #{userid} order by gathering_id desc

select * from ( select a.*, row_number() over(order by post_date desc) rn from ( select g.gathering_id, g.post_date, g.title, g.address1, (select count(*) from gathering_reply where gathering_id = g.gathering_id) as reply_count from gathering g where show = 'y' )a ) where rn between 1 and #{size}

(select count(*) from attendee a2 where a.gathering_id = a2.gathering_id and type = 'a') as attendee_count from attendee a join gathering g on a.gathering_id = g.gathering_id and g.show = 'y' where user_id = #{user_id} and type = 'a'
select user_id from attendee where gathering_id = #{gathering_id} and type = 'a' order by attendee_id
